job_description:
Junior Geophysicist - Fiber-optic Sensing & AI (Fresher)

We are seeking a motivated Junior Geophysicist (recent graduate) to dive into projects involving Distributed Acoustic Sensing (DAS), fiber‑optic sensor data, and Python‑driven AI analysis. You’ll work closely with geophysicists, data scientists, and engineers to drive data‑centric insights and support field deployments.

Key Responsibilities

  • Support data acquisition, preprocessing, and interpretation from fiber‑optic sensing systems (DAS/DTS).
  • Analyze large time‑series datasets using Python (NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, Matplotlib).
  • Collaborate with AI/ML experts to build models for signal classification, event detection, or anomaly identification.
  • Participate in field activities, including deploying sensors, monitoring systems, and validating datasets.
  • Document workflows, results, and technical insights clearly in reports or code comments.

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Geophysics, Geoscience, Physics, Engineering, or related discipline.
  • Fundamental understanding of seismic wave behavior and fiber‑optic sensing principles.
  • Basic proficiency in Python and experience with data‑analysis libraries.
  • Interest in machine learning—any exposure to scikit‑learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch is a plus.
  • Excellent analytical thinking, communication skills, and collaborative mindset.

Preferred (Nice-to-Have)

  • Experience with signal processing, time‑series analysis, or seismic inversion methods.
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and Jupyter notebooks.
  • Willingness and physical ability to participate in occasional fieldwork and travel.

What You’ll Gain

  • Hands‑on experience at the intersection of geophysics, fiber‑optic sensing, and AI.
  • Mentorship from industry professionals and cross‑disciplinary collaboration.
  • Exposure to real‑world problems in energy, infrastructure, and environmental monitoring.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at lakshmi@team.tranzmeo.com
summary: Junior Geophysicist needed for fiber-optic sensing and AI projects. Analyze data, build models, and support field deployments. Recent graduates welcome.

job_description:
MongoDB Specialist

Company: Gruppozenit India (P) Ltd Location: Technopark, Trivandrum Contact Email: careers@gruppozenit.com Closing Date: September 30, 2025 Published Date: September 12, 2025

Job Description:

The candidate is required to have the following skills and responsibilities:

Key Responsibilities:

  • Installation and Configuration: Install and configure MongoDB on servers, ensuring optimal performance. This includes setting up replication, sharding, and security parameters.
  • Monitoring and Performance Tuning: Monitor the health and performance of MongoDB clusters, identify bottlenecks, and optimize the database for efficient operation. Analyze query performance, indexing strategies, and resource utilization.
  • Backup and Recovery: Implement backup and recovery strategies to ensure data integrity and availability. This involves creating regular backups, implementing replication for fault tolerance, and performing data restores when necessary.
  • Security Management: Configure access controls, authentication mechanisms, and encryption to secure the MongoDB environment. Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions for proper data protection.
  • Capacity Planning: Assess resource requirements of MongoDB deployments and plan for future growth. This includes capacity planning, scaling the database horizontally through sharding, and vertical scaling by upgrading hardware resources.
  • Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution: Identify and resolve database-related issues, such as performance degradation, connectivity problems, or data inconsistencies. Diagnose problems, analyze logs, and apply appropriate solutions.
  • Documentation and Guidance: Maintain comprehensive database documentation (configurations, procedures, best practices, structures, indexing, backups, security policies). Provide technical guidance to team members by sharing best practices, assisting with troubleshooting, and helping developers optimize database interactions.

Requirements:

  • Experience: 3-5 years of experience as a Database Administrator, with a strong focus on MongoDB.
  • MongoDB Version: Knowledge of MongoDB 4.2 and higher versions.
  • Technical Skills: Hands-on experience with MongoDB replication, sharding, and performance tuning.
  • Tools & Techniques: Proficiency in database monitoring tools and troubleshooting techniques.
  • Scripting: Experience in scripting and automation (e.g., Python, Bash, or PowerShell).
  • Cloud (Plus): Familiarity with cloud-based database solutions (AWS, Azure, or GCP) is a plus.
  • Database Principles: Understanding of database security, access control, and data integrity principles.
  • Soft Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Good communication skills and ability to work in a team-oriented environment.

Application Instructions:

On the subject line, please mention "Please mention the Post you are applying with Experience / Current Location".

Preferred Skills (a plus):

  • MongoDB certification (MongoDB Certified DBA or equivalent).
  • Knowledge of SQL and experience with other NoSQL databases.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps methodologies.
summary: Seeking a MongoDB Specialist with 3-5 years of DBA experience. Responsibilities include installation, configuration, monitoring, performance tuning, and security management of MongoDB clusters.

About Us:

At ECESIS, we have built a strong reputation over the years as a trusted partner in management consulting and talent acquisition, with a specialized focus on the advanced manufacturing sector. We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Full Stack Software Engineer to join our dynamic multinational team, specializing in the Geospatial domain (Location-Based Services - LBS, Geographic Information Systems - GIS). This role focuses on the development and enhancement of sophisticated geospatial platforms and applications. The ideal candidate will possess strong expertise in a range of technologies including Java, Springboot, Python, Vue.js, and AWS cloud services, coupled with a passion for building high-quality, scalable, and impactful software solutions that leverage geographic data and spatial analysis.

  • Design, develop, test, deploy, and maintain robust and scalable web applications and services for geospatial data processing, visualization, and analysis, utilizing Vue.js for front-end and Java (with Springboot), Python for back-end development.

  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.
  • Solid experience with cloud platforms, particularly AWS (including services like EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, API Gateway, Location Service).
  • Experience with GIS tools and libraries (e.g., QGIS, ArcGIS APIs, GeoServer, MapServer, Leaflet, OpenLayers, Mapbox GL JS).
  • Understanding of core GIS concepts, map projections, coordinate systems, and spatial analysis techniques.

Additional Skills:

  • Experience with other front-end frameworks like React.js.
  • Familiarity with other cloud platforms (e.g., Azure, Google Cloud) and their geospatial offerings.
  • Experience with Big Data technologies for geospatial data (e.g., Spark, Hadoop).
  • Knowledge of mobile development (iOS/Android) for LBS applications.
  • Experience with containerization technologies like Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes.
  • Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and associated tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI).

  • Problem-Solving and Analytical Thinking

  • Ownership and Accountability
  • Proactiveness and Initiative

job_description:
Senior Embedded Software Engineer - Camera (Android)

About Us: At ECESIS, we have built a strong reputation over the years as a trusted partner in management consulting and talent acquisition, with a specialized focus on the advanced manufacturing sector. Our success is driven by our ability to consistently deliver world-class, high-quality talent, particularly in the areas of precision engineering, assembly line operations, and other skilled manpower across diverse industrial domains. Among our esteemed clients is a listed Japanese company that is set to begin its operations in Technopark, Thiruvananthapuram, further reinforcing our standing as a premier recruitment partner in the region.

Summary: We are seeking a skilled and experienced Embedded Software Engineer to join our team, focusing specifically on the development and optimization of camera functionality for our embedded devices running on Android. This role will involve working deeply with Quectel smart modules and their underlying platforms, developing and integrating camera drivers, implementing image processing pipelines and ensuring high-quality camera performance tailored to specific application needs.

Company: ECESIS CARE (P) Ltd Location: Bangalore, Karanataka, India / Trivandrum, Kerala, India Employment Type: Full-time Experience: 1-5 Years Educational Qualification: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science/Electronics/Electrical Engineering or a related Engineering field. Closing Date: 25, Sept 2025 Job Published: 12, Sept 2025 Contact Email: amrithas@ecesistech.com

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop and integrate kernel and user space camera drivers for various components including image sensors, autofocus (AF) actuators, EEPROMs and LED flashes.
  • Configure camera-related hardware interfaces, manage GPIOs for control and set up power supplies and power-on/off sequences within the kernel device tree.
  • Implement and configure user space driver parameters, defining sensor output formats (like RAW or YUV), connection modes (such as MIPI CSI), resolutions, frame rates and MIPI CSI lane configurations.
  • Integrate and configure camera tuning data, including chromatix code for Bayer sensors or handle specific configurations required for YUV sensors.
  • Troubleshoot and debug camera bring-up failures, image quality issues and performance bottlenecks by analyzing kernel logs and system behavior, looking for errors like SOF freeze, ERROR_CRC and ERROR_PHY_DL0_FIFO_OVERFLOW.
  • Work on the Android Board Support Package (BSP), focusing on the Camera Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL) to provide a consistent programming interface for applications.
  • Utilize standard Android SDK Camera APIs for developing camera-based applications.
  • Collaborate closely with hardware engineers during the component selection phase (image sensors, lenses, processors, etc.) and contribute to the overall embedded camera system design.
  • Perform camera tuning processes to fine-tune hardware and software parameters, achieving optimal performance and image quality for specific applications by adjusting settings like Autofocus (AF), Auto Exposure (AE) and Auto White Balance (AWB).
  • Explore and integrate AI/ML algorithms for advanced vision functionalities such as object detection, facial recognition or predictive analytics. For example, use of AI and machine learning with Quectel modules for road hazard detection.
  • Ensure thermal management considerations are adequately addressed in software design to maintain system efficiency and reliability, especially in demanding operating environments.
  • Implement and execute effective testing procedures under various lighting conditions and scenarios to ensure product reliability and consistent performance.
  • Leverage Hardware Abstraction Layers (HALs) to enhance the flexibility, scalability and future-proofing of camera designs.

Mandatory Skills:

  • Proven experience in embedded software development, with a strong focus on camera systems and Android platforms.
  • Proficiency in C/C++ programming is essential for interacting with system APIs and low-level hardware.
  • Experience with Android BSP and HAL development, specifically the camera HAL, is a key requirement.
  • Familiarity with camera driver development models in both the kernel and user space on Linux/Android systems.
  • Hands-on experience working with camera interfaces such as MIPI CSI.
  • Practical experience in bringing up and configuring camera sensors, including understanding I2C communication, power sequencing and timing.
  • Experience in debugging complex embedded camera systems, including log analysis for hardware and software issues.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience working with Qualcomm multimedia and camera frameworks is highly desirable.
  • Knowledge of image processing concepts and algorithms, including 3A algorithms (AF, AE, AWB), noise reduction and color correction.
  • Experience with specific Quectel smart module series (e.g., SC600Y/T, SC200E/V, SA800U, SG865W).
  • Experience working with Quectel smart modules and Qualcomm processors used in embedded devices is a significant advantage.
  • Understanding of performance optimization techniques for real-time image processing and video streaming.
  • Experience integrating and optimizing AI/ML algorithms within embedded vision systems.
  • Knowledge of relevant communication protocols for camera systems.
  • Experience with camera tuning tools, labs and methodologies.
  • Contribution to open-source projects like LineageOS or Google AOSP.

Behavioral Skills:

  • Leadership Potential
  • Communication Excellence
  • Client Relationship Management
  • Problem-Solving and Analytical Thinking
  • Adaptability and Flexibility
  • Collaboration and Teamwork
  • Ownership and Accountability
  • Proactiveness and Initiative
  • Professionalism and Integrity

CDIPD is seeking an experienced Database Administrator (DBA) to design, implement, maintain, and secure enterprise-level database systems for high-performance, mission-critical digital solutions. This role requires expertise in both on-premise and cloud environments, ensuring database reliability, availability, and scalability.

Roles & Responsibilities

  • Design, install, configure, and upgrade enterprise-class database systems (relational and NoSQL).
  • Ensure high availability and disaster recovery using clustering, replication, and backup strategies.
  • Monitor database performance and implement tuning strategies for optimal query execution and resource utilization.
  • Manage database security, including authentication, authorization, auditing, and data encryption.

  • Collaborate with application development teams on data modeling, schema design, and performance-aware SQL development.
  • Automate routine DBA tasks using scripts and tools.
  • Conduct regular health checks, audits, and capacity planning for database infrastructure.
  • Participate in cloud migration and modernization projects, utilizing cloud-native database services (e.g., AWS RDS, Azure SQL).
  • Maintain documentation on database configurations, procedures, and operations.

Desirable Qualification: - Certifications such as Oracle Certified Associate (OCA), Microsoft SQL Server Certification, PostgreSQL Certification, or equivalent.

Desirable Experience

  • Designing and implementing complex database architectures for large-scale enterprise applications.
  • Exposure to cloud-native database solutions (AWS RDS, Azure SQL, Google Cloud SQL) and hybrid cloud deployments.
  • Familiarity with disaster recovery planning, database failover strategies, and real-time data replication.
  • Hands-on experience with automation tools and scripting (Shell, Python, Ansible) for database maintenance.
  • Strong knowledge of data warehousing concepts, ETL tools, and reporting/BI integration.
  • Knowledge of database migration processes.

Preferred Skills & Requirements

  • Proven expertise in managing large-scale, enterprise-grade database systems (on-premise and cloud).
  • Hands-on experience in database performance tuning, query optimization, indexing, and bottleneck resolution.
  • Proficiency in backup and recovery strategies, disaster recovery planning, replication, and high availability architectures.
  • In-depth knowledge of PL/SQL, stored procedures, triggers, and database design best practices.
  • Familiarity with relational databases (Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Cassandra).
  • Strong understanding of database security practices (access controls, encryption, auditing).
  • Experience with monitoring and health check tools for production databases.
  • Exposure to cloud-native database services (AWS RDS, Azure SQL, Google Cloud SQL) and DevOps practices (CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code).
  • Ability to collaborate effectively with development teams on data modeling, schema design, and deployment.

Contract: Initial appointment for one year, extendable based on performance and project needs.

Senior Java Engineer

Company: Way Dot Com (P) Ltd / Way.Com India Pvt Ltd Location: 4th Floor, Yamuna, Technopark Phase-III, Thiruvananthapuram, 695583 Website: http://www.way.com Contact Email: careers@way.com Closing Date: 14, Sept 2025 Job Published: 12, Sept 2025

About Us

Way.com is America’s dominant automotive super app, serving over 10 million customers with services including auto insurance, parking, and EV charging. We utilize cutting-edge AI, machine learning, and advanced data analytics to provide innovative and personalized solutions that transform car ownership. Recognized by Bloomberg, ranked 48th on Andreessen Horowitz’s Marketplace list, and awarded top Product in Insurance by UnitQ, Way.com is making car ownership easier, more affordable, and more rewarding.

Job Title: Senior Java Engineer

Experience Required: 5–12 years Work Arrangement: On-site Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview

We are seeking an experienced Senior Java Developer with deep expertise in Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, and RESTful APIs. This role involves architecting, developing, and optimizing high-performance, scalable applications, establishing technical standards, and mentoring junior team members.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Build, enhance, and maintain Java applications leveraging the Spring Boot framework, ensuring robust, scalable, and high-quality solutions.
  • Partner with Product Owners, Architects, and other stakeholders to convert business needs into effective technical designs.
  • Develop and integrate RESTful APIs to support application features and streamline system interoperability.
  • Continuously improve application performance through code optimization, refactoring, and scalability enhancements.
  • Lead code reviews, guide and mentor junior developers, and help drive adoption of best engineering practices.
  • Keep abreast of advancements in the Java ecosystem and proactively apply relevant technologies.
  • Diagnose, troubleshoot, and resolve complex technical issues to maintain system stability and reliability.
  • Uphold industry standards and organizational guidelines throughout the software development lifecycle.

Preferred Skills

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent work experience).
  • Minimum of 5+ years of professional Java development experience, with strong proficiency in Spring Boot and MySQL.
  • In-depth knowledge of Java SE and Java EE concepts, including multi-threading, design patterns, and JVM internals.
  • Solid experience in designing and implementing RESTful APIs.
  • Proficiency in MySQL (or other relational databases) and writing efficient SQL queries.
  • Familiarity with modern version control tools, particularly Git.
  • Experience working within Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, etc.).
  • Strong problem-solving, debugging, and troubleshooting skills.
  • Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate in a team environment.
  • Proven ability to mentor and guide junior developers.

Why you will love working with us?

  • Opportunity to work for the #1 Auto Super app in the US.
  • Opportunity to make a meaningful impact across 10+ million users.
  • Dynamic, fast-paced, and innovation-driven work culture.
  • Clear pathways for career growth in a rapidly scaling technology company.
  • Competitive compensation.

Apply Now: https://waydot.greythr.com/hire/jobs/senior-java-developer
summary: Senior Java Engineer sought for Way.com to architect and develop scalable applications. Requires 5+ years Java, Spring Boot, and MySQL experience for this on-site, full-time role.

company: Kerala University Of Digital Sciences, Innovation And Technology
job_description:
Software Solution Architect (Job Code: CDIPD/SSA/02/2025)

Organization: Kerala University of Digital Sciences, Innovation and Technology (Digital University Kerala) Centre: Centre for Digital Innovation and Product Development (CDIPD) Location: Technopark Phase-IV Campus (Technocity), Mangalappuram, Thonnakkal PO, Trivandrum, Kerala, 695317 Website: https://duk.ac.in Contact Email: directorcdipd@duk.ac.in Application Portal: https://cdipd.duk.ac.in/career Closing Date: September 22, 2025 Job Published: September 12, 2025

Brief Description

The Centre for Digital Innovation and Product Development (CDIPD) at Digital University Kerala is seeking highly qualified Indian citizens for project-based positions focused on Digital Innovation, Digital Transformation, AI, and Data Analytics. CDIPD develops cutting-edge digital solutions for enterprise-level projects and adheres to CMMI Level 3 industry standards. We offer an inclusive work environment with industry-standard facilities, infrastructure, and excellent career growth opportunities through challenging projects and exposure to cutting-edge technologies.

Essential Experience:

  • Minimum 10 years of experience in software design, architecture, and development.
  • Proven track record in designing scalable, robust, and high-performance software solutions.
  • Experience in microservices architecture, cloud computing, containerization (Docker/Kubernetes), and enterprise application development.
  • Strong background in system integration, API design, and security best practices.
  • Strong hands-on experience with Java, J2EE, Spring Boot, Microservices, RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL, MySQL, React, and Next.js.

Desirable Qualification:

  • Certifications in Enterprise Architecture (TOGAF, Zachman Framework) or Cloud Architecture (AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Google Cloud Architect, Microsoft Azure Solutions Architect Expert).

Job Description:

The Software Solution Architect will be responsible for designing, implementing, and overseeing scalable, secure, and high-performance software solutions. This role involves collaboration with cross-functional teams to define technology roadmaps, solution frameworks, and best practices.

Roles & Responsibilities:

  • Define and implement end-to-end software architectures that meet business and technical requirements.
  • Ensure alignment with industry best practices, security, and compliance standards.
  • Develop high-level architectural blueprints, technical specifications, and Proofs of Concept (POCs).
  • Evaluate and recommend emerging technologies and frameworks to enhance system capabilities.
  • Provide architectural governance and ensure adherence to CMMI Level 3+ development processes.
  • Design and implement scalable, interoperable, and secure system integrations.
  • Establish API management frameworks, ensuring performance, scalability, and security best practices.
  • Architect cloud-native applications and hybrid cloud solutions.
  • Implement CI/CD pipelines and best practices.
  • Guide and mentor development teams in software design principles, coding standards, and architecture best practices.
  • Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to industry standards and best practices.

Desirable Experience:

  • Experience in architecting solutions for large-scale IT/ITES organizations or digital transformation projects.
  • Knowledge of CMMI Level 3+ processes, Agile, and DevSecOps methodologies.
  • Familiarity with big data analytics, AI/ML integration.
  • Experience in developing highly available and distributed systems.

Required Skills:

  • Expertise in software architecture, system design, and enterprise integration patterns.
  • Deep understanding of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and hybrid cloud solutions.
  • Strong knowledge of database design (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB), data modeling, and performance optimization.
  • Proficiency in DevOps, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure as code.
  • Excellent problem-solving, leadership, and technical mentoring skills.
  • Strong communication and stakeholder management abilities.
  • Strong mentoring and team interaction skills.
summary: Seeking a Software Solution Architect with 10+ years of experience in designing scalable, secure, and high-performance software solutions. Responsibilities include defining architectures, mentoring teams, and implementing cloud-native applications.
